thread.title_full: Gwen Stefani gushes about 'incredible guy' Blake Shelton | Daily Mail Online

author: Justin Enriquez For Dailymail.Com
title: Gwen Stefani gushes about 'incredible guy' Blake Shelton | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Gwen Stefani admitted to being the biggest Blake Shelton fan. But it wasn't always that way as she didn't even know who he was until working together on The Voice in 2014. The 47-year-old singer gushed about her 40-year-old boyfriend during an appearance on Late Night With Seth Meyers on Tuesday night. Scroll down for video Stunning: Gwen Stefani was a guest on Late Night With Seth Meyers on Tuesday night Aww: It was there where the 47-year-old singer gushed about boyfriend Blake Shelton, as the two are pictured in LA earlier this month She said: 'I love Blake! He is the most incredible guy. Everybody loves Blake, and that's the thing. There's no way around it. 'He's just a sparkly like happy, amazing person.' Gwen even admitted to not being familiar with Blake or his work prior to them starring together on the reality competition series. 'I love Blake! He is the most incredible guy': Gwen had nothing but good things to say about the 40-year-old country crooner Honest: The blonde beauty even admitted to not being familiar with Blake or his work prior to working together on The Voice but she now calls herself his 'biggest fan' The No Doubt singer said: 'I didn't even know Blake Shelton existed in the world.' Her mom and sister-in-law were familiar with the hunk as they watched the show, however, and Gwen followed as she familiarized herself with his work. She said: 'Trust me I'm like the biggest Blake Shelton fan ever now. I know all of his music.' As Gwen will be returning for season 12 of The Voice and competing against Blake, she joked that it has been tense around the house as she said: 'He's been on the couch a few nights so far.' 'He's been on the couch a few nights so far': As she is returning to the program, she joked that it has been tense around their household as she said: 'He's been on the couch a few nights so far' Gwen split from Gavin Rossdale last year after 12 years of marriage amid rumours of his infidelity. She quickly found love with the She's Got A Way With Words hitmaker and they have been inseparable since. Gwen and Blake will be joining fellow coaches Adam Levine and Alicia Keys when The Voice returns on February 17 on NBC. They're back!
